The area South-west of YPRBS has been subjected to gas-shell bombardments.2*We carried out three successful minor operations last night between the ANCRE and the SOMUE which enabled us to advance our line slightly and capture a few prisoners *3. On the rest of the Front there is no change.General Staff,War Office, S*W.l, 8th May, 1918.Issued at 12.30 p*m.optne personal information4*-1*of the IV?finisten only.
